name: OmniFocus GTD
description: Complete OmniFocus task management integration for Claude Desktop. Add tasks, manage projects, process inbox, conduct reviews, and implement GTD methodology.
author: Community Contributors
readme:
# OmniFocus GTD Extension

A comprehensive OmniFocus integration for Claude Desktop that enables natural language task management.

## Features
- Add tasks with natural language parsing
- View and process inbox
- List today's tasks and upcoming due dates
- Complete tasks by name
- Create and manage projects
- Search across all tasks
- Weekly and daily reviews
- GTD methodology support
